data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Penza, Russia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Penza, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Penza, Russia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary: On average, 116 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Penza, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Penza, Russia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Penza, Russia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Adyghe people. Make the Adyghe people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, of the 804,766 people in the state of Penza who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Penza, Russia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Penza
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Penza
location.people_groups_list: Altai, Andalal, Nanai, Hezhen, Yukagir, Chechen
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Altai (76,000), Andalal (62,000), Nanai, Hezhen (4,900), Yukagir (1,600), Chechen (5,300)
